query: dame la distancia entre gdl y qro
result:
Ask_Gemini

Claro, aquí tienes la información formateada en HTML, manteniendo un estilo claro y legible. ```html Distancia Guadalajara - Querétaro

Distancia entre Guadalajara (GDL) y Querétaro (QRO)

La distancia por carretera más común entre Guadalajara, Jalisco y Santiago de Querétaro, Querétaro es de aproximadamente 355 kilómetros.

Detalles por Medio de Transporte

  • 🚗 En Automóvil

    Distancia: ~355 km

    Tiempo de viaje estimado: Entre 3 horas y 30 minutos a 4 horas y 30 minutos, sin contar paradas. Este tiempo puede variar significativamente según el tráfico, especialmente al salir de Guadalajara o entrar a Querétaro.

    Ruta principal: Generalmente se toma la Autopista 15D (Guadalajara-Zapotlanejo) para luego conectar con la Autopista 45D (León-Querétaro).

  • 🚌 En Autobús

    Tiempo de viaje estimado: El trayecto dura entre 4 y 5 horas, dependiendo de la línea de autobús y la cantidad de escalas que realice.

    Disponibilidad: Es una de las rutas más populares, con salidas muy frecuentes desde la Central Nueva de Guadalajara.

  • ✈️ En Avión (Distancia en línea recta)

    Distancia: ~290 km (180 millas)

    Tiempo de vuelo: El vuelo directo dura aproximadamente 1 hora. Considera el tiempo adicional para llegar al aeropuerto, documentar y pasar los filtros de seguridad.

```

CDEX-405380In ProgressOMD/OMV - Enable the Duplicate check at ingestion level Hello, Currently duplicate check is disabled at ingestion level for OMD and OMV , Can we enable it back ?  to avoid processing same files tiwce and sending the records/files to downstream  "file.duplicate.check: "false"" to "True" We had a scenario on OMV FFA ARIA production where legecy placed the *16* ABV  test calls made on *4/23 and 4/24  +* Legacy has resent an additional  *13 files*  from *4/11 and 4/15 (these files* *have already been processed by OMV and sent to vetter )* FTS has  a duplicate check for 1 day  which is why they still sent the old files to OMV  So to avoid these kind of scenarios   can we enable the  dublicate check in OMV and OMD ingestion level ? any performance impact if we enable it ? if this can be enabled please let us know in which upcoming patch this can be delivered as this is part of Main code repo  Also can FTS increase the duplicate check for 1 day to 7 days   the Ticket was not assigned to right group and has been reassigned today

How_to_fix

🎫 Ticket ID: CDEX-405380

Status: In Progress

Summary: OMD/OMV - Enable the Duplicate check at ingestion level

Last comments: Hi [~fc2953]: this ticket needs discussion with Architect and if agreed to implement this change, we need a developer to work on this. can you please take care of this.

Ticket URL: Open

Recommendations:

  • Schedule a meeting with the application architect and development lead to evaluate the performance impact and feasibility of implementing this change.
  • Analyze potential solutions, such as using a distributed cache (e.g., Redis) to store message hashes or IDs for a specific time window to check for duplicates.
  • Create a technical design document outlining the proposed approach, resource requirements, and potential risks before assigning it to a developer.

🎫 Ticket ID: CDEX-461443

Status: To Do

Summary: CDO LAG - Partition 43 - VOICE Stats Production :topic

Last comments: No comments available

Ticket URL: Open

Recommendations:

  • Use Kafka command-line tools (e.g., `kafka-consumer-groups.sh`) to inspect the consumer group's lag, current offset, and end-of-log offset for the specified topic and partition.
  • Analyze the consumer application logs assigned to partition 43 for errors, exceptions, or long processing times that could be causing the lag.
  • Check the resource utilization (CPU, memory, network I/O) on the consumer instance handling partition 43 to identify any system-level bottlenecks.

🎫 Ticket ID: CDEX-375806

Status: To Do

Summary: OMV | Software Vuln | ANDF Version Upgrade

Last comments: keep this ticket in developer queue until and unless it resolves.

Ticket URL: Open

Recommendations:

  • Create a dedicated feature branch in the OMV source code repository to begin the ANDF framework upgrade and isolate changes.
  • Consult the ANDF v24.12 release notes to identify any breaking changes, deprecated methods, or required configuration updates for the OMV application.
  • Collaborate with the QA team to establish a detailed regression test plan to ensure application stability and verify the vulnerability remediation after the upgrade.

📚 External Documentation

  • Apache Kafka / Confluent: Monitoring Consumer Lag
